description.@en: Your prayers lead the suffering away from the threshold and back to the light.

data.distance: Any one person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Your words are twisted, as you forget the correct convocation to draw your god’s might. Your victim immediately suffers the Effects of another Disease (of the GM’s choosing).

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but if the person lost points from their Primary Attributes due to a Disease’s Effects, these points are restored.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch is cured of the Disease they are suffering from. A Character may only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

reagents.@en: The proper treatment agents required to normally treat the Disease (expended)
